name: Wikigender
description: A data story for exploring the gender linguistic in the overview of Wikipedia biographies.
SDGevidence: This project explores gender linguistic bias in the overview of Wikipedia biographies. All information related to their research and machine learning model developed by them can be found here : https://wiki-gender.github.io/#topic-bias, https://github.com/natbolon/wiki-gender. They provide statistics proving the underrepresentation of women in Wikipedia, insights on occupations in Wikipedia and gender stereotypes.
